unnormalised: Hey folks, solar rooftop subsidies are a game changer! Heard aunty Padma in Chennai got hers, slashed her electricity bill by half! Imagine, watching IPL without sweating over the bill. Diwali bonus sorted! Wish the process was quicker though, BSNL speed levels sometimes. Rs. 20,000 subsidy helps, but more awareness needed, especially in villages. Next Onam, biryani for everyone with the savings!
